original_text: And the same hour was there a great earthquake, and the tenth part of the city fell, and in the earthquake were slain of men seven thousand: and the remnant were affrighted, and gave glory to the God of heaven.
korean_text: 그 때에 큰 지진이 나서 성 십분의 일이 무너지고 지진에 죽은 사람이 칠천이라 그 남은 자들이 두려워하여 영광을 하늘의 하나님께 돌리더라

sentences.original_text: And the same hour was there a great earthquake
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 같은 시간에 큰 지진이 일어났다

sentences.original_text: and the tenth part of the city fell
and in the earthquake were slain of men seven thousand
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 지진으로 사람 칠천이 죽었다

sentences.original_text: and gave glory to the God of heaven
